import styles from './Record.module.css'; const Record = (lead) => { const checkBoxHandler = () =>{ console.log(lead); } return
{lead.lead.company|| "-"}
{ lead.lead.first_name|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.last_name|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.email|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.website|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.s_email|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.language|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.phone|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.mobile|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.fax|| "-" }
{ lead.lead_source|| "-" }
{ lead.lead_industry|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.skype_id|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.state|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.street|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.po|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.zip_code|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.city|| "-" }
{ lead.lead.country|| "-" }
} export default Record;
